00024 #ifndef _CALIBRATIONPARAMETERS_HPP_
00025 #define _CALIBRATIONPARAMETERS_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include <cmath>
00029 #include <stdexcept>
00030 #include <iostream>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace data {
00035 
00036 
00037 const double thermoA_ = 1.075e8;
00038 const double thermoB_ = -3.455e8; 
00039 
00040 
00041 #pragma pack(1)
00042 struct CalibrationParameters
00043 {
00044     double A;
00045     double B;
00046 
00047     CalibrationParameters(double a=0, double b=0);
00048     double mz(double frequency) const;
00049     double frequency(double mz) const;
00050     bool operator==(const CalibrationParameters& that) const;
00051     bool operator!=(const CalibrationParameters& that) const;
00052 
00053     static CalibrationParameters thermo();
00054 };
00055 #pragma pack()
00056 
00057 
00058 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const CalibrationParameters& p)
00059 {
00060     os << "(" << p.A << "," << p.B << ")";
00061     return os;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 inline CalibrationParameters::CalibrationParameters(double a, double b)
00066 : A(a), B(b)
00067 {}
00068 
00069 
00070 inline double CalibrationParameters::mz(double frequency) const
00071 {
00072     if (frequency == 0) throw std::runtime_error("[CalibrationParameters::mz()] Division by zero.\n");
00073     return A/frequency + B/(frequency*frequency);
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 inline double CalibrationParameters::frequency(double mz) const
00078 {
00079     if (mz == 0) throw std::runtime_error("[CalibrationParameters::frequency()] Division by zero.\n");
00080     return (A+sqrt(A*A + 4*B*mz))/(2*mz);
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 inline bool CalibrationParameters::operator==(const CalibrationParameters& that) const 
00085 {
00086     return A==that.A && B==that.B;
00087 } 
00088 
00089 
00090 inline bool CalibrationParameters::operator!=(const CalibrationParameters& that) const 
00091 {
00092     return !operator==(that); 
00093 } 
00094     
00095 
00096 inline CalibrationParameters CalibrationParameters::thermo()
00097 {
00098     return CalibrationParameters(thermoA_, thermoB_);
00099 }
00100

00102 } // namespace data
